resources.string: Enable Accessibility Service to perform a global action. For example going back, opening power dialog, etc. Please be assured that Screenshot Helper will not collect any personal information. Tap the switch at the top-right corner. After tapping the switch , the system will send a notice warning you about your personal information. System Requirements: Android 4.1 or later version
Enable Accessibility Service to perform a global action. For example going back, opening power dialog, etc. Please be assured that Screenshot Helper will not collect any personal information.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
